text:
I think revamping to docs to address the points from <#CEQQ9NFK2|releases-and-updates> is a good thing
> • Single source of truth across all of HubSpot’s public APIs and each of their versions
> • Overhauled search
> • New design language
> • Holistic information architecture restructure
> • Responsively designed from the ground up
> • New content for getting started
> • Linking to individual endpoints
One question though: what is _New design language_?
can y’all style the docs to look more like the in-app docs (the crm development beta)?
